both_present.speaker: Narrator
both_present.text: For the first time, Elena and Thomas are sitting at the same table. Not speaking, not looking at each other, but sharing the same space. Your dragon lies between them like a furry mediator.

thomas_speaks.speaker: Thomas
thomas_speaks.text: *After a long silence* Do you remember when we were kids... and I broke Mother's favorite vase? You told her it was you.

elena_remembers.speaker: Elena
elena_remembers.text: *A reluctant half-smile* You cried for an hour afterward because I got punished. Kept trying to tell the truth and I kept shushing you.

thomas_why.speaker: Thomas
thomas_why.text: Why did you do that? Take the blame for me?

elena_simple.speaker: Elena
elena_simple.text: *She shrugs* Because you were my little brother. Because I knew Mother would be harder on you. Because... *her voice softens* Because protecting you was just what I did.

thomas_emotional.speaker: Thomas
thomas_emotional.text: *His voice catches* You protected me my whole life, Elena. From bullies, from my own stupid decisions, from everything. And when you tried to protect me from Margot...

thomas_admits.speaker: Thomas
thomas_admits.text: I chose her. *He looks down at his hands* And I've spent every day since wondering how I could have been so blind. So cruel. You were trying to save me and I... I...

thomas_breaks.speaker: Thomas
thomas_breaks.text: *His composure shatters* I'm so sorry, Elena. I'm so sorry. I know it's not enough. I know words can't fix what I did. But I need you to know - I never stopped loving you. Not for one day.

elena_responds.speaker: Narrator
elena_responds.text: Elena is silent for a long moment. When she speaks, her voice is thick with emotion.

elena_speaks.speaker: Elena
elena_speaks.text: I tried to stop loving you. *A tear escapes* I tried so hard. I told myself you were dead to me. That I didn't care. But every birthday, every holiday... the empty chair hurt.

elena_confession.speaker: Elena
elena_confession.text: I'm tired, Thomas. Tired of being angry. Tired of being alone. Tired of pretending I don't miss my little brother every single day.

thomas_hope.speaker: Thomas
thomas_hope.text: *Desperately hopeful* Does that mean... can we... I'll do anything, Elena. Whatever it takes. I'll spend the rest of my life making it up to you.

elena_conditions.speaker: Elena
elena_conditions.text: *She holds up a hand* I'm not ready to forgive you. I don't know if I ever will be. But... *she takes a shaky breath* ...I'm willing to try. Slowly. Carefully.

thomas_accepts.speaker: Thomas
thomas_accepts.text: *Relief floods his face* That's more than I deserve. More than I dared hope for. Thank you, Elena. Thank you.

elena_warning.speaker: Elena
elena_warning.text: Don't thank me yet. This is going to be hard. I'm going to get angry. I'm going to bring up old wounds. You'll have to be patient with me.

thomas_promises.speaker: Thomas
thomas_promises.text: I waited five years just to sit at the same table as you. I can wait however long it takes.

dragon_happy.speaker: Narrator
dragon_happy.text: Your dragon lifts its head and makes a happy rumbling sound, as if sensing the shift in the air. For the first time, Elena and Thomas share a small smile - not at each other, but at the dragon between them.
